TopicTitle: Do you have a screenshot that makes you laugh every time?

Articles.Content:
> 
> How about this ![k_cheesy.gif](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/images/smilies/k_cheesy.gif)
> 
> 
> 
> <iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/wRXNQbomQNE?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

I've only read the first page of the thread so far, but I think you win ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-11T21:06:50Z" title="06/11/2015 09:06  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 11, 2015</time> by purpleivan**
  
Forgot to quote

This one, only because of the K-OS Blue Screen of Death!

![D2ED17E1ED82988846C4E9F58D297CB28A0AD3F7](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/536254665683706155/D2ED17E1ED82988846C4E9F58D297CB28A0AD3F7/)

For what it's worth, this pic always makes me laugh... I placed the chutes on my Eve lander too low down when I was drop testing it on Kerbin, so after they were deployed, it slowly rotated 180 degrees and went down nose first.

![tHoct68.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/tHoct68.jpg)
That doesn't look like it ended well.

![eVGE4MN.png](http://i.imgur.com/eVGE4MN.png)

Don't know why, Don't know how

But this

I think this sums it up.

![qmVFNl1.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/qmVFNl1.jpg)

![mU2JmIj.png](http://i.imgur.com/mU2JmIj.png)

Was testing a rover for my Duna base, and this happened.

![sfmoUYe.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/sfmoUYe.jpg)

I don't remember what the plan was, I only remember I had to rescue a Kerbal that got stuck on Mun.

It doesn't make me laugh, but it does make me smile every time that I do see it.

![5bgLWBk.png?1](http://i.imgur.com/5bgLWBk.png?1)

![G7tck9N.jpg](http://imgur.com/G7tck9N.jpg)

Errrr... Jeb. That isn't how gravity works.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-16T23:21:24Z" title="06/16/2015 11:21  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 16, 2015</time> by purpletarget**

Just saw the "Fake Mun Landing" thread in challenge section and thought of this:

![tumblr_msz56gOOvH1r9pr04o1_250.gif](https://31.media.tumblr.com/c55a639fc5a150923bfafad413783d47/tumblr_msz56gOOvH1r9pr04o1_250.gif)

Not mine and not a screenshot, but it's good.
![screenshot91_zps705df479.png](http://i49.photobucket.com/albums/f299/barrio3885/KSP%20mADNESS/screenshot91_zps705df479.png)

lol, it arrives!

I left him in there because I was scared.

![zXhlFtL.png](http://i.imgur.com/zXhlFtL.png)

Dancing on Pol:

![Busqgn4.png](http://i.imgur.com/Busqgn4.png)

That look of concentration, coupled with the ridiculous plane:

![GmjFvgS.png](http://i.imgur.com/GmjFvgS.png)

![ln63mB7.png](http://i.imgur.com/ln63mB7.png)

Yes, Jeb, that's how you dismount a rover.

> 
> I left him in there because I was scared.
> [http://i.imgur.com/zXhlFtL.png](http://i.imgur.com/zXhlFtL.png)

Where's the other half?

Looks JUST like a cartoon:

![huvpy0f.png](http://i.imgur.com/huvpy0f.png)
<iframe allowfullscreen="true" frameborder="0" width="640" height="360"></iframe>

> 
> Looks JUST like a cartoon:
> \*snip\*

Great, now I'm gonna have the Talespin theme stuck in my head for the rest of the day... ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

> 
> Just some screenshots from, ahem, 'testing' ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> [https://imgur.com/a/SQ4qX](https://imgur.com/a/SQ4qX)

50m of <abbr title="Kerbal Attachment System (mod)">KAS</abbr> winch cable was obviously not enough to abseil down the <abbr title="Vehicle Assembly Building">VAB</abbr>...

**Edited <time datetime="2018-01-26T12:27:47Z" title="01/26/2018 12:27  PM" data-short="6 yr">January 26, 2018</time> by Whizzkid**

My profile picture was not entirely photoshopped... It actually came from a real screenshot.

![ZVCH1iS.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/ZVCH1iS.jpg)

My LLES as part of my Kapollo Program. Seemed to work best by orienting to the surface retrograde vector, resulting in my kerbals flying sideways to whatever their destination was.

![0xMcK3S.png](http://i.imgur.com/0xMcK3S.png)

his little face gets me every time hes regretting his life decisions. 

![0D4B5E1A708A203A2D0297096580FD9D8B40AD9E](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/27345357509090088/0D4B5E1A708A203A2D0297096580FD9D8B40AD9E/)

Not mine, but it's been in my bookmarks ever since I found it. Makes me smile every time.

![o7WWbtz.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/o7WWbtz.jpg)

Not sure how this happened:

![nTt5aTn.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/nTt5aTn.jpg)
